text: Vasvavikata yo ho ki juna kurako jnanamathi niyantrana prapta garna sakenan tyasala'i jhutha bhani aropa laga'e, ra yasaile yasako satyata unimathi prakata nai bha'eko chaina. Yasaigari jo manisaharu yiniharubhanda pahila thi'e tiniharule pani jhutha bhaneka thi'e, tasartha hernus atyacariharuko parinama kasto bhayo
